name: 30-Min Forex Bollinger Volume Mean Reversion
description: Intraday mean-reversion strategy for EUR/USD, GBP/USD and USD/JPY using Bollinger Bands (20,2), 150 % tick-volume spike and an engulfing confirmation candle. Runs on 30-minute bars, risks max 1 % equity with a 0.25 % fixed stop. Partial exit at the 20-period SMA, final exit at the opposite band or after four bars.
